EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Robert (1323886630.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Robert (1323886630.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Test 110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE I know its been a while right? How are things in the Philippines; we actually use a handful of subcontractors there. Would love to meet up when you get back into the states.
Regards,
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Robert Becker [mailto:rbeckerchi@yahoo.com] Sent: Wednesday, December 14, 2011 11:18 AM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners Robert
Hi Steven:
WOW!! What a surprise to hear from you! How have you been? To answer your question, I am currently working as a W-2 employee for a great company and as a matter of fact, I am now living and working in the Philippines!
When I come back to the states, maybe we can go out for a cup of coffee and chat a bit. I would love to see you again and catch up on some old times!
Sincerely,
Robert Becker
From: Steven Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> To: rbeckerchi@yahoo.com Sent: Thursday, December 15, 2011 12:03 AM Subject: MBO Partners Robert
----- Forwarded Message ----- sarhancet@mbopartners.com is not on your Guest List | Approve sender | Approve domain Dear Robert, Its been some time since we last spoke with you, but I personally wanted to check in and share some news with you. We recently launched a new consultant-focused Web site which includes relevant tools such as a Bill Rate Calculator, a self-assessment tool on independence, and a video that shows how we help independents succeed in todays project economy. We encourage you to take a look. Whatever your work life stage, I also hope you can join me in celebrating the news that independent work life in America has arrived. Our company is well into a year-long effort called The State of Independence in America. I encourage you to view some very interesting findings on the size and trends for independent work in our nation. Please feel free to reply to this email and provide an update on how your contract search is going. Are you working on a project now or you currently working W2 at the moment? Steven Arhancet ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
